+
+[source, subs=attributes+]
+----
+ ./mvnw quarkus:add-extension -Dextensions="openshift"
+----
+
+To trigger a build and deployment in a single step:
 
 [source, subs=attributes+]
 ----
 ./mvnw clean package -Dquarkus.kubernetes.deploy=true
 ----

replies.bodyText: OpenShift CLI is required for running oc commands from a terminal.  A lot of tasks, not all,  could be achieved using the Web Console instead of using CLI but a developer needs to be comfortable with using CLI in my view.
replies.author: jackhu008

replies.bodyText: Yeah I know, my point is that the CLI is only needed when you want to do perform the manual deployment
